events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product was not what I expected and I would like to request a refund.
The issue has been classified under the Refund category based on the customer's description.
Support agent Lisa has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! I'm Lisa from customer support. I understand you'd like to request a refund. I'll help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and explain the reason for the refund in more detail?
My order number is 987654321. The item arrived damaged and does not match the description on the website.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the amount credited within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate your help with resolving this refund promptly.
The refund process has been completed on our end. Please let us know if you have any further questions.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund and if everything is satisfactory on your end.
Yes, the refund came through successfully today. Thank you again for your excellent service.
We are closing this case now as the refund issue has been fully resolved to the customer's satisfaction.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather feedback on the support experience.
